file list shows subs included

Unfortunatelly There are no subs, have tried both players ,VLC and WMP but nothing,maybe the uploader can help in this respect?
Thanks a lot
For the subtitles to work in VLC player you need to have both the 29.7 KB IDX file and 2.88 MB SUB file in the same directory as the movie all named the same.
